actions.text: Committee on Finance ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Finance. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Dole under the authority of the order of May 13, 81. With written report No. 97-104.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 132.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: An original bill to authorize appropriations for the United States Customs Service for fiscal year 1982, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Customs Procedural Reform and Simplification Act of 1978 to authorize appropriations for the U.S. Customs Service for fiscal year 1982. Prohibits use of any money appropriated under such authorization to pay any U.S. Customs Service employee overtime pay in excess of $25,000.

titles.title: An original bill to authorize appropriations for the United States Customs Service for fiscal year 1982, and for other purposes.
